items.eventTitle: Academy of Science Fiction, Fantasy & Horror Films, USA

awardsHtml:
7 wins & 3 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2021 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Animated Program
Genndy Tartakovsky (executive producer/director) - Brian A. Miller (executive producer) - Jennifer Pelphrey (executive producer) - Keith Crofford (executive producer) - Mike Lazzo (executive producer) - Oussama Bouacheria (executive producer) - Julien Chheng (executive producer) - Ulysse Malassagne (executive producer) - Shareena Carlson (supervising producer) - Darrick Bachman (head writer/story by) - David Krentz (written by/story by) - Bryan Andrews (story by) (For episode "Plague of Madness")
2021 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Individual Achievement in Animation
David Krentz (storyboard artist) (For episode Plague of Madness (2020))
2020 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Individual Achievement in Animation
Genndy Tartakovsky (storyboard artist) (Episode: "Spear and Fang (2019)")
2020 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Individual Achievement in Animation
Scott Wills (art director) (Episode: "Spear and Fang (2019)")
2020 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Individual Achievement in Animation
Stephen DeStefano (character designer) (Episode: "A Cold Death (2019)")

Annie Awards

2023 Nominee Annie
Outstanding Achievement for Production Design in an Animated Television/Media Production
Scott Wills (Episode S2E10: "Echoes of Eternity (2022)")
2021 Winner Annie
Best General Audience Animated Television/Media Production
(Episode: "Coven of the Damned (2020)")
2021 Winner Annie
Outstanding Achievement for Directing in an Animated Television/Media Production
Genndy Tartakovsky (Episode: "Plague of Madness (2020)")
